Test Name: ATYPICAL HEMOLYTIC UREMIC SYNDROME (aHUS) Complement Panel
Purpose: To generate timely and accurate complement panel results to aid in the diagnosis and monitoring of atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome (aHUS).
Container: EDTA tube or serum separator tube
Equipment: Complement panel ELISA kit, centrifuge, pipettes, calibrated ELISA reader, -80Â°C freezer
